msg.search_terms_warn:
Search Terms can only contain English characters and numbers. (A-Z, 0-9). Search terms must be seperated by a comma and a space.
Your search term(s) did not follow these rules.
msg.additional_term: You are able to enter another search term. This will search for records that contain your original query(-ies), OR your new query.

questions.enter_another: Would you like to enter another search term? (REPLY WITH "yes" or "no")
